articles.description: Isabella Grant will become the fourth Bulldog to make her AFLW debut this season.
articles.content:
Isabella Grant will become the fourth Bulldog to make her AFLW debut this season when she runs out onto GMHBA Stadium this Friday night against Geelong.
Grant will become the first father-daughter s… [+1220 chars]
